mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital.h_nurse_tb (name, work_id, gender, age, npt_id, major_direct, phone, enter_date, status, description) VALUES (#{name}, #{workId}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{nptId}, #{majorDirect}, #{phone}, #{enterDate}, #{status}, #{description})
mapper.update:
UPDATE hospital.h_nurse_tb
name = #{name},
work_id = #{workId},
gender = #{gender},
age = #{age},
npt_id = #{nptId},
major_direct = #{majorDirect},
phone = #{phone},
enter_date = #{enterDate},
status = #{status},
description = #{description},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT hn.id, hn.work_id AS workId, hn.name, hnpt.nurse_profashion_title AS profashionTitle, hdpt.name AS departmentName, hn.major_direct AS majorDirect, hn.phone, hn.enter_date AS enterDate, hn.status, hn.gender AS gender, hn.age AS age, hn.description AS description FROM hospital.h_nurse_tb hn LEFT JOIN hospital.h_nurse_profashion_title_tb hnpt ON hnpt.id = hn.npt_id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_clinic_room_nurse_tb hcn ON hn.id = hcn.nurse_id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_clinic_room_tb hc ON hcn.clinic_room_id = hc.id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_department_tb hdpt ON hdpt.id = hc.department_id WHERE hn.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, nurse_profashion_title AS profashionTitle FROM hospital.h_nurse_profashion_title_tb ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT hnt.id, hnt.work_id AS workId, hnt.name AS name, hntp.nurse_profashion_title AS profashionTitle, hdt.name AS departmentName, hnt.major_direct AS majorDirect, hnt.phone AS phone, hnt.enter_date AS enterDate, hnt.status AS status, hnt.gender AS gender, hnt.age AS age, hnt.description AS description FROM hospital.h_nurse_tb hnt LEFT JOIN hospital.h_nurse_profashion_title_tb hntp ON hntp.id = hnt.npt_id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_clinic_room_nurse_tb hcrnt ON hnt.id = hcrnt.nurse_id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_clinic_room_tb hcrt ON hcrnt.clinic_room_id = hcrt.id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_department_tb hdt ON hdt.id = hcrt.department_id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_user_tb u ON u.id = hnt.id LEFT JOIN hospital.h_role_tb r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username} LIMIT 1
